    • Method Detail

      • instance

        public static ProxyFactory instance()
        Singleton method for obtaining ProxyFactory instance. If value has not been set explicitly, it looks to the FUNCITO_PROXY_PROVIDER_PROP system property for a string value to select one of the three pre-defined proxy providers: "CGLIB", "JAVASSIST", or "JAVAPROXY". If the system property is not defined, the classpath is checked first in priority for CGLIB, then for Javassist, finaly falling back to the less capable native Java dynamic proxies.

      • setInstance

        public static void setInstance(ProxyFactory factory)
        This method can be used to set custom ProxyFactory implementations. The only recommended use is if the program environment cannot define a system property or it cannot be accessed from within the program. Also, it should only be called once per program, or else results will be unpredictable.
        Parameters:
        factory - The one-time provided factory for the program instantiation.
        See Also:
        Funcito.setProxyProviderProperty(String)

      • reset

        public static void reset()
        Exists for benchmarks suite, to try with different proxy providers. DO NOT USE IN REAL PROGRAMS!

      • proxy

        public <T> T proxy(Class<T> clazz)
